statements: SELECT * FROM FacialRecognitionResults;
SELECT user_id, confidence_score FROM FacialRecognitionResults WHERE confidence_score > 0.8;
SELECT user_id, date_time FROM FacialRecognitionResults ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, recognition_result FROM FacialRecognitionResults WHERE recognition_result -> 'is_match' = true;
SELECT * FROM FacialRecognitionResults WHERE date_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT user_id, recognition_result, confidence_score FROM FacialRecognitionResults WHERE confidence_score > 0.8 ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM FacialRecognitionResults WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT face_image FROM FacialRecognitionResults WHERE date_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY date_time ASC;
SELECT user_id, recognition_result->>'name' AS user_name, confidence_score FROM FacialRecognitionResults WHERE confidence_score BETWEEN 0.5 AND 0.9 ORDER BY confidence_score DESC;
SELECT count(*) AS total_results FROM FacialRecognitionResults WHERE date_time >= '2022-01-01' AND date_time < '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM face_recognition_results;
SELECT face_id, result FROM face_recognition_results WHERE id = 5;
SELECT image_path FROM face_recognition_results WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT face_id, report_text, report_date FROM report_history ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT reporter_name, report_text FROM report_history WHERE face_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM face_recognition_results WHERE id = 1;
SELECT face_id, image_path FROM face_recognition_results ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT result->'name' AS face_name, result->'confidence' AS confidence FROM face_recognition_results WHERE face_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM report_history WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT reporter_name, COUNT(report_id) AS num_reports FROM report_history GROUP BY reporter_name HAVING num_reports > 1 ORDER BY num_reports DESC;
SELECT * FROM facial_recognition_results;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM persons WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT MAX(recognition_score) AS highest_score FROM facial_recognition_results;
SELECT date_of_birth, COUNT(*) AS num_persons FROM persons GROUP BY date_of_birth;
SELECT * FROM facial_recognition_logs ORDER BY recognition_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM facial_recognition_results WHERE recognition_score > 0.9 ORDER BY recognition_score DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, nationality FROM persons WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT result_id, recognition_time FROM facial_recognition_logs ORDER BY recognition_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM facial_recognition_results JOIN persons ON facial_recognition_results.person_id = persons.person_id WHERE recognition_score < 0.5;
SELECT person_id, recognition_score FROM facial_recognition_results WHERE recognition_score BETWEEN 0.4 AND 0.6;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username, full_name FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, email FROM Users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM FaceRecognitionResults ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM UserRoles WHERE role_id = 1 ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM FaceRecognitionResults;
SELECT user_id, image_url FROM FaceRecognitionResults WHERE id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email FROM Users WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM UserRoles JOIN Roles ON UserRoles.role_id = Roles.role_id WHERE Roles.role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT id, image_url, detection_result->>'face_count' AS face_count FROM FaceRecognitionResults WHERE detection_result->>'face_count' > '5' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM FacialRecognitionResults;
SELECT subject_name, recognition_timestamp FROM IdentifiedSubjects;
SELECT face_id, image_id FROM DetectedFaces ORDER BY face_id DESC;
SELECT subject_name, total_recognitions FROM IdentifiedSubjects WHERE total_recognitions > 5;
SELECT * FROM FaceMatches WHERE match_score < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM FacialRecognitionResults WHERE id = 1;
SELECT subject_name, recognition_timestamp FROM FacialRecognitionResults WHERE recognition_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_matches FROM FaceMatches WHERE match_score > 0.8;
SELECT subject_name, total_recognitions FROM IdentifiedSubjects ORDER BY total_recognitions DESC;
SELECT log_id, log_message FROM RecognitionLogs WHERE recognition_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
